page.title: 18The leisure centre.
page.content: The Ashington Leisure centre was opened in 1975.It is for all sorts of sports like squash,karate and roller skating.The Leisure Centre is not just used for sports,it is also used for shows eg Johny Ball and dances.There are pop groups visiting there in front of lots of people.My dad goes there to play squash.Sometimes he plays in tournaments there.When I go to the swimming baths I normally go in the older peoples pool where there is an inflatable spider.My friends Alison and Gayle go to gymnastics and trampolining.
